thread.title: Aaron Sorkin and Danny Boyle on the making of "Steve Jobs"

title: Aaron Sorkin and Danny Boyle on the making of "Steve Jobs"
text:
Published By: CBS News: Entertainment - Today 
The writer and director join "CBS This Morning" to discuss the movie and challenges they encountered with the Jobs family and friends...
